summary: Makes the weight of weapons in the game closer to a realistic weight.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s always annoyed me how overweighted the weapons in the game are so I went through and lowered them a bit because well their is no such thing as a 10 pound steel sword. 

Note: I messed up on the screen shots, only weight is changed damage and value are unaffected. 

The following weapons and their new weights that I\'ve changed are listed below, as I fix more I\'ll update the list.

Update: April 14, 2012

Falmer 
Sword 3.5
War axe 4
Sword honed 3.5
War axe honed 4

Draugr
Sword 3.5-
Greatsword 8-
Battleaxe 9-
Waraxe 4-

Bows 
Glass
Falmer Supple

Update: February 21, 2012:

Glass

Greatsword 6.5

Battleaxe 7

Warhammer 8

Dawnbreaker
